process.name: Issue Management
process.documentation:
This process handles all issues. It will automatically be started when a new issue is created. Roles are assigned dynamically by the process using the configured user expressions.
First a reviewer can accept to do the review, or if no reviewer responds within time-limit, the issue manager is asked to assign a reviewer. The reviewer can then choose to ask more information, choose another reviewer, reject the issue or accept the issue and propose a solution.
If the issue is accepted, the stakeholders are asked to vote for the proposed solution and if accepted, the reviewer can assign a assignee and ask him to implement the solution.
The assignee can reassign to another assignee or implement the solution himself. After implementing the reviewer is asked to review the solution and when accepted, the requester is notified of the resolution and the process is ended.

activiti:formProperty.name: Time before escalation of "Accept Review" task
Time before "Provide Solution" task is escalated
Time before "Provide more information" task is escalated
Time before a warning is send to the stakeholders for approving the proposed solution
Time before the approve solution by the stakeholders step is continued
User expression for stakeholders of the issue
User expression for reviewers of the issue
User expression for Assignees of the issue
User expression for users to fallback to when the users of the initial user task are empty
User expression for Issue Managers of the issue
Send an action email to users that are required to vote in the process

userTask.name: Reassign Reviewer
userTask.documentation: Assign a new reviewer for this issue.

userTask.name: Appoint assignee or mark as resolved
userTask.documentation: Appoint the assignee to solve this issue or immediately mark this issue as resolved.

userTask.name: Provide Information
userTask.documentation: Please provide more information about this issue.

userTask.name: Accept Review
userTask.documentation: Do you want to review this issue?

userTask.name: Analyse and propose solution
userTask.documentation: Please review, analyse and propose a solution for this issue.

userTask.name: Assign Reviewer
userTask.documentation: Assign a reviewer for this issue.

userTask.name: Reappoint Assignee
userTask.documentation: Assign another person to solve this issue.

userTask.name: Provide Solution
userTask.documentation: Please provide the solution for this Issue.

activiti:in.sourceExpression: ${"Please verify if the proposed solution is acceptable. If not, please reject and provide a reason."}
